title: Jakarta MVC made simple
content: This article discusses how to get started with Jakarta Model-View-Controller (MVC) to build Web applications using this well-known Web pattern in a Jakarta EE application. Model-View-Controller in a nutshell Model-View-Controller (MVC) is a popular pattern in Web frameworks to build HTML applications.
